description.ko: 심해 탐사의 궁극적인 개척지를 경험하세요. AQUA-5 미션은 심해의 극한 수압 아래 숨겨진 생물 발광의 비밀과 고대 지질 구조를 밝혀내기 위해 미드나잇 존으로 잠항합니다.
description.en: Experience the ultimate frontier in deep-sea exploration. The AQUA-5 mission dives into the midnight zone to uncover the bioluminescent secrets and ancient geological formations hidden beneath the crushing pressure of the abyss.

prompt: Cinematic shot of a high-tech modular research station submerged in the deep ocean trenches, glowing bioluminescent flora, a sleek futuristic submarine named AQUA-5 docking at the bay, dark navy and cyan lighting, scattering light rays, bubbles, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, volumetric lighting, epic scale
